title: pazani ninra
language:
Tamil

viruttam

tEn pazhani vElavanE
en manattin oLi viLakkaay
enrum ninravanE
mangil naDamaaDungra
maadEvan satguruvE
sahitya:
pazhani ninDra paraman tanda
pazhama daana deivamE
(pazhani)

anupallavi 

azhagu deivam aruLil deivam
kuzhandai deivam kumara deivam
(pazhani)

caraNam 

kaadal vaLLi kaNDa deivam
kaNNin maNiyaay ninDra deivam
vEdam pOTrum gnyaana deivam
vENDuvOrai kaakum deivam
(pazhani)
